select t.*,t1.supplier_name as supplierName,t2.note as contractStatusNote, t3.cust_name as custName,t4.contract_name as contractNameS from t_pss_contract_purchase t left join t_pss_supplier t1 on t.part_b = t1.supplier_code left join t_pss_dict t2 on t.contract_status = t2.code and t2.type = 'htzt' LEFT JOIN t_pss_customer t3 on t.cust_code = t3.cust_code LEFT JOIN t_pss_contract_sale t4 on t.contract_code_s = t4.contract_code where 1=1
and t.id = #{id}

and t.contract_code = #{contractCode}
